scene_description_enriched: A man, dressed in a blue tunic and white hose, is depicted in the act of harvesting wheat. He wields a scythe, his body bent as he swings it towards a large sheaf of golden wheat. Behind him, more sheaves are stacked, and a patterned red tapestry or wall forms the backdrop. The ground is tiled in a light blue. The scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
